hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: What do you want to do when you've finished? medicaninc.com Please could the Telegraph publish details of any 'Risk Assessment' that the Government has done regarding 'fracking' and human health, including possible contamination of water supplies, and the radioactive impact of the fracking process (Cuadrilla has just applied to the Environment Agency for a 'Permit application for proposed radioactive substances activity' in Balcombe).
